field.name: paramId
field.remark:
identifier of pricing parameter
810301 reward amount of free resource（long integer）
810321 multiplication factor of free resource reward（integer）
810001 discount value of basic tariff（double type）
810332 member amount of group discount ( integer )
820001 RC_BASE_FEE--basic fixed charge, replace configuration data of pricing according to inputted parameter ( integer )
820101 history charge of cross-year discount ( integer )

field.name: paramClass
field.remark: calssification of pricing parameter details are reserved and default 0
